extensionDescription.message: Seçili metni ve tüm sayfayı Google Translate ile çevir.

addOnSiteSummary.message: Bu eklentiyle herhangi bir metni, bir tıkla ya da tuşla kendi dilinize çevirebilirsiniz. Ya seçili metni çevirebilir ki böylece çeviri özgün metnin yerini alır, ya da tüm sayfayı da çevirebilirsiniz.
addOnSiteSummary.description: Description of the extension displayed on the Mozilla Add-On Site. Maximum 250 characters.

browserActionLabel.description: Displayed string for the Red T toolbar icon.

contextMenuTranslateSelected.description: Context menu action string to start selection translation.

contextMenuTranslatePage.message: Bu sayfayı Google Translate ile çevir
contextMenuTranslatePage.description: Context menu action string to start page translation.

contextMenuOpenOptions.description: (Red T toolbar icon) context menu action string to open Add-On Options.

browserActionHotKeyDescription.description: Description of the browser action and its hotkey.

errorMessageOnInvalidTextLength.description: Error message text shown when the selection cannot be translated because of invalid text length.

errorMessageIfTranslationFailed.message: Translation failed because an error happened during the translation process.
errorMessageIfTranslationFailed.description: Error message text shown when the translation failed due to some - yet unknown - error or abortion.

optionsPage_generalSettingsTitle.description: Title of General settings fieldset on the Options page.

optionsPage_languageOfTranslation.description: Name of the language of translation setting on the Options page.

optionsPage_whatToTranslateTitle.message: Araç çubuğu simgesi tıklandığında ne çevrilsin:
optionsPage_whatToTranslateTitle.description: Title of What to translate fieldset on the Options page.

optionsPage_translateSelectionLabel.description: Name of the selection translation mode setting on the Options page.

optionsPage_translatePageLabel.description: Name of the page translation mode setting on the Options page.

optionsPage_translateSelectionIfPossible.message: Uygunsa seçili metin, değilse tüm sayfa (önerilen)
optionsPage_translateSelectionIfPossible.description: Name of the selection translation of possible mode setting on the Options page.

optionsPage_saveButtonText.description: Text of the Save button on the Options page.

optionsPage_optionsSavedStatusText.description: Displayed text when the Save button is pressed and the options are saved on the Options page.
